Attributes.description: Spectroscopy of organic compounds. Mechanistic analysis of chemical reactivity of common functional groups with a focus on carbon-carbon bond formation; functional group interconversion. Preference will be given to students in Chemistry or Biochemistry specializations.
Attributes.prereq: Pre-reqs: Either (a) one of CHEM 203, CHEM 223 or (b) a score of 76% or higher in CHEM 233.
